title: Bulgaria clears path for public defibrillator use in cardiac emergencies [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: Defibrillator use in cardiac arrest cases increases patient survival rates by between 49% and 75%, the government wants to improve access for non-medical responders
summary_public: Defibrillator use in cardiac arrest cases increases patient survival rates by between 49% and 75%, the government wants to improve access for non-medical responders

BG.label: positive
BG.evidence: Bulgaria clears path for public defibrillator use in cardiac emergencies
